name: Accessibility
description: The ability to obtain or use a service or product without difficulty or inconvenience.

name: Affordability
description: The ability to purchase a service or product at a reasonable cost.

name: Accountability
description: The responsibility of an individual or organization to be answerable for their actions.

name: Adaptability
description: The ability to adjust to changing circumstances or requirements.

name: Availability
description: The presence of a service or product when needed.

name: Efficiency
description: The ability to achieve a desired result with minimal effort or cost.

name: Equity
description: The fairness of a system or process, ensuring all individuals or groups are treated equally.

name: Inclusion
description: The practice of including individuals or groups who have been historically excluded.

name: Innovation
description: The introduction of new ideas, methods, or products.

name: Integrity
description: The adherence to moral and ethical principles.

name: Quality
description: The degree to which a service or product meets or exceeds expectations.

name: Reliability
description: The ability of a system or process to consistently produce the desired result.

name: Responsiveness
description: The ability to quickly and accurately respond to customer needs.

name: Safety
description: The practice of protecting individuals from harm or injury.

name: Sustainability
description: The ability to maintain a desired level of performance over time.

name: Transparency
description: The practice of providing clear and accurate information.

name: Usability
description: The ease with which an individual can use a service or product.

name: Value
description: The benefit an individual or group receives from a service or product.

name: Empowerment
description: The practice of giving individuals or groups the authority to make decisions.

name: Engagement
description: The practice of actively involving individuals or groups in a process or activity.
